com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide
Class ViewDrugActivity

java.lang.Object
  android.content.Context
      android.content.ContextWrapper
          android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
              android.app.Activity
                  com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.CommonActivity
                      com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.LoggedInActivity
                          com.fewstera.injectablemedicinesguide.ViewDrugActivity
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback
public class ViewDrugActivity
extends LoggedInActivity

This class is an activity for displaying a drug and all its information. If a drug has a calculator, this will also allow the user to navigate to the calculator for that drug.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Aidan Wynne Fewster
